p: This plant extract has been used for the cryopreservation of boar semen [ 49]. The range of extract concentrations added to the semen extender was from 2 to 10 mg/L. After semen thawing, there was an enhancement in several sperm parameters, such as motility, acrosome and membrane integrity, and mitochondrial activity. An increase in GSH as well as a decrease in MDA levels were also observed in the sperm samples treated with this plant extract. The most suitable extract concentration ranged from 4 to 8 mg/L.
